e1.name: Reckless Swing
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Olaf''' strikes thunder onto the target enemy, dealing them {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}.

''Reckless Swing'' {{tip|heals}} '''Olaf''' for {{as|{{sti|health|its health cost}}}} if it kills its target and its {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second every time '''Olaf''' lands a [[basic attack]].
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Olaf strikes thunder onto the target enemy, dealing them true damage.
Reckless Swing heals Olaf for its health cost if it kills its target and its cooldown is reduced by 1 second every time Olaf lands a basic attack.
e1.notes:
* The health cost is equal to 30% of the '''total''' damage dealt by the ability.
* ''Reckless Swing'' can be cast even if '''Olaf''' doesn't have the sufficient amount of health to pay for the health cost.
** As with all abilities with health costs, ''Reckless Swing'' will not reduce '''Olaf's''' health below {{as|1|hp}}.
* ''Reckless Swing's'' health refund is considered {{tip|heal|healing}} therefore it is affected by {{ai|Vicious Strikes|Olaf}} and {{ii|Spirit Visage}}.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or '''Olaf''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Reckless Swing'' cancels and its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|health cost}}}} are not consumed.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{as|{{ap|21 to 75}} {{as|(+ 15% AD)}}|health}} as 0/39/57/75/93/15/0 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

w1.name: Vicious Strikes
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Olaf''' empowers his axes for 6 seconds, gaining
{{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, '''bonus''' {{stil|life steal}}, and {{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 33 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=0.33% per 1% missing health}}|health}} increased {{tip|heal|healing}} from all sources for the duration.
''{{sti|Life steal}} and {{sti|spell vamp}} '''bonuses''' are calculated on-cast and remain static for the full duration.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Olaf empowers his axes for 6 seconds, gaining
bonus attack speed, bonus Unknown value: stil life steal, and 0 to 100 ‒ undefined increased healing from all sources for the duration.
Life steal and spell vamp bonuses are calculated on-cast and remain static for the full duration.
w1.notes:
* {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with [[omnivamp]]
* If the ability is re-casted the duration refreshes without re-calculating the bonuses.

i1.name: Berserker Rage
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Olaf''' gains {{as|{{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 75 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=0.75% per 1% missing health}}|health}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}|attack speed}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Olaf gains 0 to 100 ‒ undefined bonus attack speed.

q1.name: Undertow
q1.target_range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|310|Minimum missile range, estimated}} / {{tt|1000|Maximum missile range}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Olaf''' throws an axe to the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it passes through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{pp|type=distance traveled|1.5 to 2.5 for 9|400 to 1000|formula=1.5+(0.125 per 75 units traveled)}} seconds.

The axe impacts at the target location, briefly grants {{tip|sight}} of its immediate surroundings and remains there for a duration equal to the {{sti|cooldown}}. '''Olaf''' reduces the cooldown of ''Undertow'' by {{fd|4.5}} seconds upon retrieving the axe by walking within pickup distance of it.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies it passes through and slowing them for 400 to 1000 ‒ undefined seconds.
Olaf grants ghosting to monsters hit for 6 seconds.
The axe impacts at the target location, briefly grants sight of its immediate surroundings and remains there for a duration equal to the cooldown. Olaf reduces the cooldown of Undertow by 4.5 seconds upon retrieving the axe by walking within pickup distance of it.
q1.notes:
* ''Undertow'' may hit additional targets upon landing, but not targets already struck in-flight.
** The axe will land approximately 50 units further than ''Undertow's'' target range if cast below maximum range.
* The axe is stopped prematurely upon encountering {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}, remaining on the ground upon collision.
* The timer for how long an axe stays on the ground does not begin until it has landed, thus it is possible to throw another axe before retrieving the first.
* '''Olaf''' cannot pick up an enemy '''Olaf's''' axe on the ground.
* ''Undertow'' will fire from wherever '''Olaf''' was at the start of the cast time.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|7|Starts on cast}}' as '7/0' and riot's value '7,7,7,7,7' as '7'

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)

  • Slow: %

r1.name: Ragnarok
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Olaf''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} while ''Ragnarok'' is inactive.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Olaf''' becomes enraged for 6 seconds, initially {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}} and becoming {{tip|Cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} and gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} as well as 10% increased [[size]] for the duration. For the first second of ''Ragnarok'', he also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} towards {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champions}} within 2000 units.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Olaf gains bonus armor and bonus magic resistance while Ragnarok is inactive.
Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 6 seconds, initially cleansing himself of all crowd control and becoming immune to crowd control and gaining bonus attack damage as well as 10% increased size for the duration. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains bonus movement speed towards visible enemy champions within 2000 units.
r1.notes:
* ''Ragnarok'' removes the underlying {{tip|stun}} from {{tip|airborne}} effects, but not the forced displacement, which requires him to use a {{tip|blink}} or {{tip|dash}} ability to override it.
* ''Ragnarok'' does not bypass self or ally applied effects, unless otherwise stated. Some examples include {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, {{ii|Guardian Angel}}, and {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}.
** He prevents both ally and enemy {{ci|Bard}} from putting him in {{tip|stasis}} with {{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}.
** The ability will remain for its full duration regardless.
** He cannot be knocked {{tip|airborne}} by the {{ui|Blast Cone}} regardless of ally or enemy.
* ''Ragnarok'' does not negate any {{tip|debuff|debuffs}} other than {{tip|crowd control}} from being applied unless absolutely necessary.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} updates dynamically over the duration; Increases or reductions in {{as|attack damage}} after the effect has been applied will still be amplified.
* The {{as|30% attack damage}} scaling amplifies the flat {{as|attack damage '''bonus'''}} aswell.
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|100|90|80}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/100/90/80/0' and riot's value '100,90,80' as '100/90/80'
